name: Aura of Courage
description: While within your Commanding Aura, creatures of your choice have ADV on Saves against the Frightened condition.

name: Protective Orders
description: When a creature gains the benefits of your Commander's Call they gain 1 point of Damage Resistence of the next source of Physical Damge they take before the start of your next turn.

name: Gallant Hero
description: Your presence is a symbol of hope and safety to those around you. You have ADV on Checks to convince creatures not to be afraid.

name: Straigten Up
description: Once per Combat, when you use your Commander's Call, you can remove the Frightened condition form one creature within your Commanding Aura.

name: Battlefield Tactics
description: Allies within your Commanding Aura deal +1 damage on their first Melee Attack on each of their turns against a creature they're flanking.

name: Priority Target
description: You gain a new Commanding Aura option:\\n- Priority Target: (cost: 1 AP + 1 SP) Choose a creature within 10 Spaces of you. Until the start of your next turn, each creature within your Aura has ADV on the first Attack it makes against your chosen target.
